name: STAR BOY (itch)
description:
STAR BOY IS A 2D PLATFORM GAME. THE TASK OF THIS PERSONAGE IN QUESTION, OR LUKE, IS TO COMPLETE THE LEVELS, WHICH AS THEY WILL GET MORE DIFFICULT, AND TO WIN A MEDAL THAT GOING FORWARD WILL BECOME A GOLDEN MEDAL! THE GAME IS DOWLOADABLE AND IT'S FREE FOR BOTH CHILDREN AND ADULTS !!

          YOUR TASK IS TO COLLECT COINS, TO INCREASE YOUR POINTS AND GO FORWARD !!        

COLLECT AS MUCH STARS AS POSSIBLE SO AS TO BECOME THE STAR OF THE WORLD AND GO FORWARD WITH THE MEDALS !!

BE VERY CAREFUL OF ENEMIES !! THERE ARE THREE KINDS OF IT THIS SEASON! 

      -THE RADIATORS

   -THE GUARDIANS

 -THE SPEEDERS

   GIVE YOURSELF YOUR TIME, AND COLLECT EVERY KEY TO GET TO THE NEXT LEVEL! CREDITS:
-GRAPHICS
FROM GDEVELOP STORE
-PROGRAMMING
BY SOCCIROCK
- MUSIC AND SOUNDS
BY ZAPSPLAT ABOUT ME:

HELLO MY NAME IS EUGENIO I AM 12 YEARS OLD, (NICKNAME SOCCIROCK) AND I MADE THIS FIRST GAME IN TWO MONTHS, AND DECIDED TO OPEN A SERIES AND CONTINUE THE SEASONS !!

NEW LEVELS, NEW SKINS AND NEW WORLDS WILL COME OUT
